title: 🛍️ Generate Product Descriptions 🛍️
text: Generate product descriptions for any type of product. Simply enter your product name and we'll fetch the best description suited for your product.

title: 📧 Cold Email Template 📧
text: This is perfect for marketing agents or companies who need fresh ideas daily on cold email content that is created by AI technology.

title: 🐤 Generate Tweets 🐤
